0.2.name: wordpress/wiki-style-autolinks
0.2.description:
Link automatically to any post or page on your site with the syntax [A:page-title] or [A:post-title]. You can too try to link to another predetermined site (read the installation setp 2)

Features:

  • decide to apply the default style, or set your own CSS style.
  • decide if to add or not the rel=nofollow attribute to each link generated )
